FuncDef: The reset netstream statistics command clears the IPv4, IPv6, or VXLAN flexible flow statistics on a device. The reset netstream statistics command clears the IPv4, IPv6, or VXLAN flexible flow statistics on a device.
CLIs: reset netstream statistics { ip | ipv6 | vxlaninner-ip } slot <slot-id>

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the inner packet of the IPv4 type for VXLAN packets.
-

Specifies a slot ID. If no slot ID is specified, global statistics are cleared.
The value must be set according to the device configuration.

ExtraInfo: When diagnosing and locating network faults, collect flow statistics in a specified period. Before statistics collection starts, you can run this command to delete historical flow statistics.
